results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/06]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The General de Gaulle Memorial - a small-scale model of the projected monument. The gleam of crystal - the Baccarat crystal collection. X-rays - Futura 2000. 2. The sugar industry - the beet and sugar industry and its products. 3. Para-skiing - the La Plagne championships. 4. The arts - the “Air-France and Art” Exhibition at the Galliera Museum.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 72/04]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Port installations - a new lock for heavy tankers at Le Havre. Electricity and life - an exhibition to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the French Electricity Administration. 2. Gien crockery - 150th anniversary of the Gien Crockery Works. 3. Artificial plant-breeding - hydroponic plant-growth for arid regions. 4. Tapestries - the story of David and Bathsheba. A unique set of tapestries.

results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The nativity of the master of Moulins - the Nativity painting of the Rolin museum in autumn. 2. results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: The France Australia Rugby Match - France wins 18 to 9. The Parc des Princes - Paris’ new stadium nearing completion. The arts: Balthus - sketches by Balthus. Naum Gabo - sculptures and dynamic structures.

results.title: France panorama. [No. 71/45]
results.brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Fire fighting demonstration. 2. Fight against pollution in Paris with air cleaning towers. 3. 2nd phase of SP3000 oceanic sea saucer for observation and underwater photography. 4. Clock making exhibition from 15th century until 1971 plus factory tour showing techniques and most recently, quartz watches. 5. Paris biennial art show for under 35’s. 6. Homage to Picasso who is 90 in his home town and in the Louvre. President Pompidou and his wife open exhibition of some of Picasso’s paintings.
